item.title: About ingame questions
item.dc:creator: @Master_Guru Master Guru
item.description:
@Master_Guru wrote:

  1. Idk what you mean.

  2. Logout go into source click “Characters” Folder now look for your name double click. Now look till
    you see Player Rights = 0 or something like that. Then for Mod put erase the 0 and put a 1. For Admin erase the 0 and put a 2. Finally, for Owner or so called “Master” erase the 0 and put a 3. Also if you want to be a hidden Admin which means you have no crown when you talk but you can still do pickup and other commands.

  3. To lazy to look:-P

Read full topic
